review_data.title: Must try it
review_data.content: Delicious food, we really enjoyed the food and the staff are very nice and helpful. For sure a must visit place. Good to see an African country well represented.

review_data.title: Not good.
review_data.content: There is no doubt that the host /waiter is polite and the Ethiopian beer is very nice. However, the food isn't very good. The samosas seemed to be deep fried from frozen and were incredibly greasy, with the oil dripping off them. Quite frankly, they...More

review_data.title: Ethiopian cuisine in Zürich
review_data.content: Every visit of the Meskerem was a fun for us. The people are very friendly and the food is nice. The staff explains the traditions and details about the ethiopian food and drinks.

review_data.title: Ausgezeichnet
review_data.content: Sehr feines Essen und die Bedienung ist sehr freundlich. Mal was anderes. Jederzeit sehr gerne wieder.

review_data.title: authentic ehtiopian food - but sour
review_data.content: based on the number of northeast african people among the guests, I must assume that mesob offers quite authentic food. but although I have had ethiopian in the past (mostly in london), I didn't manage to eat much because everything tasted very sour to me....More

review_data.title: A real first-hand experience
review_data.content: Don't you love it to feel your food? Well then that's the right place for you, you'll be able to enjoy authentic Ethiopian food and have some Beers which (at least) look african. The Food is great, there's a great selection of it and everything's...More

review_data.title: Different, tasty but not value for money and unfriendly service
review_data.content: That was a first! Really keen on discovering something different, we tried this place. We were 9 people and at first the service was nice, however it became very pushy to order starters. We confirmed that we only would like main courses. The plate for...More

review_data.title: Delicious !
review_data.content: This Ethiopian restaurant is very authentic in regards to the food offer. Everything was very delicious and is clearly recommendable as the price/value ratio is excellent for a city like Zurich !

review_data.title: Immer wieder gut!

review_data.title: Yummy
review_data.content: The food very good. The staff was very friendly. I finally got the food fix I need and will be are to return soon!

review_data.title: Good food, reasonable price
review_data.content: Food is delicious, one of the few vegetarian friendly places. I ordered the vegetarian platter and everything in it was delicious. Service was very good, and owner is really nice. He showed everyone how to tackle their food :) Prices are very reasonable for Zurich....More

review_data.title: Very Good and very nice service
review_data.content: We went to Meskerem for dinner at the beginning of May as a party of four. We took some white wine as aperitive, very good. Then we ordered a vegetarian appetizer and an a meskerem for four. It was extremely good and the waiter explained...More

review_data.title: Sehr, sehr leckeres Essen mit Topbedienung. Gerne wieder...
review_data.content: ...es gibt nichts mehr zu sagen! 1. Klasse Restaurant mit authentischer Küche. Leider 90km von zuhause entfernt. Pteis/Leistung 1a.

review_data.title: Nice food, very friendly service
review_data.content: I went there with a friend one evening. The restaurant was almost empty. Which was not a problem in our case as we wanted to spend a quiet evening chatting. The service was really quick and very friendly and the food was very nice. I...More

review_data.title: Delicious Ethiopian Food
review_data.content: It was a great experience to eat at Meskerem's! The food was delicious and the owner very nice and helpful. We tried the Meskerem for 2, which made us full and had a great variety of food! Would definitely recommend.

review_data.title: Mal anders

review_data.title: It was average
review_data.content: We wanted to try Ethiopian restaurant and so we did. The interior is simple, but quite cozy. The service was ok, we were seated and served immediately. The food was average, the taste was good, but not perfect. The size of portion a bit disappointing....More

review_data.title: Interesting experience
review_data.content: I had dinner there on August 2013 with my girlfriend. The restaurant is located in Wiedikon area and it is not difficult to park if you go by car. Inside there were quite a few locals hence, we thought they must serve the real Ethiopian...More

review_data.title: Great Ethiopian Food in Zürich
review_data.content: Come here frequently, the food is always of excellent quality and plentiful. Service is good, fast considering the food not pre-prepared.

review_data.title: Nice ethiopian restaurant
review_data.content: We have been going there every year for the last three years at the beginning of january for the ethiopian new years day. Food is excellent and they have a friendly service. Can strongly recommend if you like to try typical ethiopian cuisine!

review_data.title: Authentic Ethiopian Cuisine at Restaurant Meskerem in Zurich
review_data.content: I have travelled through Ethiopia during a total of ca. 2 months. On my trips I got to love Ethiopian traditional food - it is tasty, healthy and comes in many varieties. A few days ago I visited Restaurant Meskerem in Zurich and was thrilled...More

review_data.title: Great Ethiopian food in Zürich!
review_data.content: We had a wonderful Ethiopian meal in New York this summer and went to Meskerem hoping to duplicate the experience. They did not disappoint - the service was very warm and friendly and the food was delicious. If you haven't tried Ethiopian food before, I'd...More
